Entries.{{ModId}}_JojaRouteWarning/GameStateQuer: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 CharlesRowland 64 18 0/broadcastEvent/pause 1000/friendship EdwinPayne -500/friendship CharlesRowland -250/speak CharlesRowland "Hey, @.#$b#So I guess you've heard by now, but they started work on the old community center last night. Turned it into a warehouse, apparently."/pause 1000/speak CharlesRowland "It'll make things difficult for us, but there's nowhere else to move the agency to, so we've just got to carry on, yeah?#$b#Edwin's pretty angry, though... thought I should warn you.#$b#He'll get over it eventually... I hope.#$b#Just thought I should let you know."/faceDirection CharlesRowland 2/pause 1000/faceDirection CharlesRowland 0/speak CharlesRowland "Oh, and... we also heard there were plans to maybe turn it into a movie theatre. You heard anything about that?"/question null "#No#Yes"/speak CharlesRowland "Right... well, if that happened, we'd probably have to leave.#$b#You might not see us around town as much, 'cause it's not like Crystal would want us staying with her again.#$b#Just something to think about, yeah?"/pause 800/speak CharlesRowland "Anyway, see you around."/move CharlesRowland 0 2 2/pause 500/end
Entries.{{ModId}}_montyhearts7/Friendship MontyF: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 MontyFinch 64 18 0/skippable/pause 2000/speak MontyFinch "Hi, @. Sorry, I know it's kind of early...#$b#I have a favor to ask you."/emote farmer 8/speak MontyFinch "I tried to keep it a secret, but Esther made sure that didn't work.#$b#It's true... I'm actually a crow. She made me into a boy so that I could help her with her insane plans, but I'm sick of being used.#$b#I don't want to be under her thumb anymore. I want to be able to live my own life, but as a human, not as a crow."/move MontyFinch 0 -1 0/speak MontyFinch "There's a spell that could make me human, permanently. But it needs three people.#$b#Will you help me?"/question fork0 "#Of course I'll help.#No, find someone else.#Who else are you getting to help?/fork helpMontyEasy/fork noHelpMonty/speak MontyFinch "I don't know if he'll agree, but... Edwin is the best spellcaster I know.#$b#If anything goes wrong, he should be there."/question fork0 "#Why wouldn't he help?#Okay. How do I help?"/fork MontyEdwinBackstory/speak MontyFinch "I'll take care of everything. I'll send you a letter when I'm done getting the spell ready, so just wait for that.#$b#Thank you so much, @, again."/emote MontyFinch heart/emote farmer heart/move MontyFinch 0 3 2/end
Entries.helpMontyEasy: speak MontyFinch "Thank you so much. You have no idea how much this means to me."/friendship MontyFinch 100/question fork0 "#Who else are you getting to help us?#How do I help you?"/fork whoHelpMonty/speak MontyFinch "I'll take care of everything. I'll send you a letter when I'm done getting the spell ready, so just wait for that.#$b#Thank you so much, again."/emote MontyFinch heart/emote farmer heart/move MontyFinch 0 3 2/end
Entries.noHelpMonty: speak MontyFinch "Oh... okay. Forget I asked.$s#$b#Sorry to bother you. I'll go now.$s"/friendship MontyFinch -1000/move MontyFinch 0 3 2/end
Entries.whoHelpMonty: /speak MontyFinch "I don't know if he'll agree, but... Edwin is the best spellcaster I know.#$b#If anything goes wrong, he should be there."/fork0 "#I don't want to help you.#Okay. How do I help?#Why wouldn't he help?"/fork noHelpMonty/fork MontyEdwinBackstory/(break)speak MontyFinch "I'll take care of everything. I'll send you a letter when I'm done getting the spell ready, so just wait for that.#$b#Thank you so much, @, again."/emote MontyFinch heart/emote farmer heart/move MontyFinch 0 3 2/end
Entries.MontyEdwinBackstory: speak MontyFinch "It's kind of a long story, but... remember how I mentioned that Esther used me?#$b#She made me trick Edwin, manipulate him, so that she could take revenge on him and Charles after they crossed her.#$b#He was the angriest I've ever seen him.$s"/emote farmer sad/speak MontyFinch "If he won't help, well... I don't know what I'll do."/fork0 #Actually, this is a bad idea. I don't want to help you.#I'll help you convince Edwin.#If Edwin won't help, I still will. What should I do?/fork noHelpMonty/fork helpConvinceEdwin/speak MontyFinch "I'll take care of everything. I'll send you a letter when I'm done getting the spell ready, so just wait for that.#$b#Thank you so much, again."/emote MontyFinch heart/emote farmer heart/move MontyFinch 0 3 2/end
Entries.helpConvinceEdwin: speak MontyFinch "Really? That's so nice of you.$h#$b#Meet me at the Community Center later."/friendship MontyFinch 30/emote farmer heart/speak MontyFinch "I'll go start getting things ready. See you!"/move MontyFinch 0 3 2/end

Entries.{{ModId}}_montyhearts5/f MontyFinch 1250: continue/x y/farmer x y z MontyFinch x y z EstherFinch 1000 1000 3/skippable/playSound floorboardCreak/shake farmer 1000/move farmer x y z/emote farmer 40/playSound crow/move farmer x y z/move MontyFinch x y z/playSound crow/showHudMessage "There's no sign of Monty... where is he?"/faceDirection farmer 1/warp Esther Finch x y/flash/jump farmer 8/speak EstherFinch "How did you get in here, you nosy little shit?#$b#Did Monty tell you that you could come over? Lovestruck little fool."/move EstherFinch -x y z/shake farmer/speak EstherFinch "Poor thing. You don't even know the secrets he keeps."/move EstherFinch -x y z/speak EstherFinch "Wondering where he is? He's right behind you."/faceDirection farmer 3/speak EstherFinch "He's a crow, honey. You didn't know? Oops."/playSound crow/faceDirection farmer 1/speak EstherFinch "My sweet crow familiar.#$b#Too bad the little fool keeps falling in love with anyone who gives him the time of day. Oh well, he'll learn his lesson soon enough."/move farmer -x y z backwards?/speak EstherFinch "Now get out of here, kid. You're trespassing."/move farmer x y z/hurry farmer/end

Entries.{{ModId}}_montyhearts1/Friendship MontyF: continue/99 92/farmer 95 93 1 MontyFinch 1000 1000 2/skippable/move farmer 5 0 1 true/pause 3000/playSound doorClose/warp MontyFinch 101 90/move MontyFinch 0 3 3/pause 800/animate MontyFinch false false falldown/jump farmer 6/emote MontyFinch 16/speak MontyFinch "Sorry! You're the new farmer, @, right? I didn't see you there, haha."/animate MontyFinch false false getup/showFrame MontyFinch holdbooks/speak MontyFinch "I was just checking out some books about astrology."/quickQuestion #Astrology? You know that stuff is all made up, right?#Astrology? What's your star sign?#That's nice.(break)speak MontyFinch "So what? It's fun to learn about, and you can't argue that it has some truth to it."(break)speak MontyFinch "I'm a Pisces!$h"(break)speak MontyFinch "Yeah, right now I'm reading this book about how your rising sign influences your love life.$blush"/speak MontyFinch "Anyway, I have to go. Sorry again for running into you!"/move MontyFinch -10 0 3/hurry MontyFinch/faceDirection farmer 3/temporaryAnimatedSprite feathersfloatdown/emote farmer 24/pause 2000/end
